import React,{useState} from 'react' import {Form, Button} from 'react-bootstrap' function Bill() { const [itemId, setItemId] = useState("") const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(0) const [unitPrice, setUnitPrice] = useState(0) const [amount, setAmount] = useState(0) return (
Item Id setItemId(e.target.value)} /> Quantity setQuantity(e.target.value)} /> Unit Price setUnitPrice(e.target.value)} /> Amount setAmount(e.target.value)} />
) } export default Bill
